alert.note: Alert for Kiowa; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 4:52PM MDT until May 30 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PROWERS AND SOUTHEASTERN KIOWA COUNTIES... At 452 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Bristol, or 14 miles northeast of Lamar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sheridan Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
